actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE payments SET 
payment_ticket_status='RECONCILED',
accounts_remarks=concat(accounts_remarks,'-','{{reconcile_payment_remarks.text}}'::text),
updated_time=now()+'5 hours'::interval + '30 minutes'::interval,
updated_by={{appsmith.user.email}},
amount_paid={{reconcile_amount_paid.text}},
taxable_amt={{reconcile_amount_paid.text}}-{{reconcile_amount_paid.text}}*18/100,
gst_amt={{reconcile_amount_paid.text}}*18/100,
payment_mode={{reconcile_payment_mode.selectedOptionValue}},
transaction_id={{reconcile_transaction_id.text}},
transaction_date={{reconcile_transaction_date.formattedDate?reconcile_transaction_date.formattedDate:null}},
payment_source={{recon_bank_name.selectedOptionValue}},
payment_status={{reconcile_payment_status.selectedOptionValue}},
payment_clear_date={{reconcile_payment_clear_date.formattedDate?reconcile_payment_clear_date.formattedDate:null}},
payment_type={{reconcile_payment_type.selectedOptionValue}},
payment_received_by={{reconcile_payment_received_by.text}},
payment_clearance_status={{reconcile_payment_clearance_st.isChecked}},
offer_id={{reconcile_offer_code.selectedOptionValue?reconcile_offer_code.selectedOptionValue:null}},
statement_id={{reconcile_statement_id.selectedOptionValue?reconcile_statement_id.selectedOptionValue:null}}
where payment_id={{payment_report.triggeredRow.payment_id}};
